dashboard.startCreatingYourOwnNewTabPage: Start creating your own New Tab page

v400.carettabHasBeenUpdatedToVersion_4: CaretTab has been updated to version 4!
v400.aGameChangingUpdate: A game-changing update that brings unprecedented customization to your fingertips!
v400.imExcitedToAnnounce: I'm excited to announce the release of CaretTab version 4! This update has been rewritten from scratch in a modern framework with many, many new options. Along with more widgets, a toolbar, advanced customization, the extension should also run smoother and be smaller in size!
v400.thisSubstantialUpdateHas: This substantial update has necessitated a reset of most of your settings to their default state. I understand this may inconvenience you and I'm grateful for your patience. Rest assured, your user-created content within widgets has been migrated and placed in a disabled widget, a handful of other settings, where able, have been migrated as well. Thank you for your vital contribution to this app's journey.
v400.theUpcomingScreenWillGuide: The upcoming screen will guide you through initial settings to help you get up and running with the new update. When choosing a layout in the subsequent step, please know that any settings that have been migrated will still be maintained and preserved.
v400.imExcitedForYouToDiveInto: I'm excited for you to dive into the boundless customization and dynamic new features of this update! If you have any questions or problems please reach out on the {'|'}support page{'|'} or via email at {'|'}.

settings.logoAlt: Logo for CaretTab with a blue caret symbol in the middle on top of a darker blue background
settings.credit: CaretTab{'|'} is created by {'|'}BlueCaret{'|'} and licensed under {'|'}GPL 3.0{'|'}.
settings.extensionSettingsDescription: Language, tab title, advanced options and more.
settings.tabTitleDescription: Choose what to display in the New Tab title (shows on the tab itself as well as in the browser's title bar).
settings.disableTextSelectionDesciption: This will prevent you from selecting text on the new tab page resulting in a cleaner look in case of accidental clicks.
settings.hideSettingsButtonDescription: When enabled the settings button will display when you hover over the bottom right corner.
settings.widgetElementColorsDescription: Changes default colors for complex visuals within some widgets.
settings.pexelsTabCaretTabLabel: Random daily photo hand-picked to work great with CaretTab
settings.pexelsTabCaretTabDescription: Selecting a list will show a random photo from that list each day.
settings.pexelsTabCollectionsLabel: Random daily photo from Pexels lists
settings.pexelsTabCollectionsDescription: Selecting a list will show a random photo from that list each day.
settings.pexelsTabCuratedDescription: Find a single photo from Pexels curated list to use as the wallpaper.
settings.searchPexelsPhotosDescription: Find a single photo from Pexels to use as the wallpaper.
settings.searchForAPhotoAboveToSeeResults: Search for a photo above to see results.
settings.noResultsFoundPleaseTryAnotherSearch: No results found, please try another search.
settings.unsplashTabTopicsLabel: Random daily photo from Unsplash lists
settings.unsplashTabTopicsDescription: Selecting a list will show a random photo from that list each day.
settings.unsplashTabSearchDescription: Find a single photo from Unsplash to use as the wallpaper.
settings.invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Please select an image file.
settings.fileSizeTooBig: Sorry, the file size of your image is too big. Try a smaller image or resize your image at {0}
settings.imageFailedToSave: Sorry, image failed to save. Please try again.
settings.youReachedTheLimitForThisWidget: You reached the limit for this widget.
settings.goPremiumForUnlimitedWidgetsAndMore: Go Premium for unlimited widgets and more!
settings.goPremiumToGetThisWidgetAndMoreCustomiza: Go Premium to get this widget and more customization!
settings.selectABlueprintToTransformYourNewTab: Select a Blueprint to transform your New Tab
settings.whatsABlueprintDescription: A Blueprint is a pre-configured layout with various widgets and settings already set up for you. It provides an easy and quick way to customize your new tab, giving you a head start on personalizing your browsing experience.
settings.blueprintCaution: Applying a Blueprint overhauls many of your current settings, including widgets, colors, positioning, fonts, and wallpapers. While widgets with custom content such as Quotes and Notepads will be preserved, their display settings may alter. It's strongly advised to back up your current settings before proceeding.
settings.areYouSureYouWantToApplyBlueprint: Are you sure you want to apply the {'|'} blueprint?
settings.temporarilyHideTheSettngsMenu: Temporarily hide the settngs menu while hovering. Useful when styling widgets.
settings.showsAnOutlineAroundAllWidgets: Shows an outline around all widgets. Useful when positioning widgets.
settings.temporarilyMoveTheSettingsPanel: Temporarily move the settings panel to the opposite side of the screen.
settings.thankYouForSubscribingToPremium: Thank you for subscribing to Premium. Enjoy the benefits!
settings.signUpForPremiumToAccessThisFeature: Sign up for Premium to access this feature
settings.supportTheDevelopmentOfCarettab: Support the development of CaretTab with a Premium subscription. Here's what you get:
settings.thankYouForYourSupport: Thank you for your support by subscribing to Premium Access
settings.byPayingForPremiumAccess: By paying for Premium Access you receive many benefits within CaretTab including random background images, background effects, and more. Paying for Premium Access helps support the development of CaretTab. If you would like to cancel or manage your subscription you can click the button below.
settings.thankYouYouAreNowSubscribed: Thank you! You are now subscribed toPremium Access
settings.inOrderForPremiumFeaturesToBeFullyEnable: In order for premium features to be fully enabled, it is recommended to reload your tab.
settings.subscriptionBilledOn: Subscription billed on a monthly recurring basis. Cancel at any time for any reason.
settings.paymentsProcessedViaStripe: Payments processed via Stripe through ExtensionPay. View the {'|'}privacy policy{'|'}.
settings.colorPaletteSaveYourCustomColors: Color palette. Save your custom colors to the palette.
settings.saveYourColorsToThePaletteBy: Save your colors to the palette by clicking the plus. Remove them by clicking the edit button.
settings.widgetPositionsAreIndependent: Widget positions are independent of each other. If widgets are overlapping, change the alignment or adjust the position.
settings.changesSizeAndPositionForTheWidgetsConta: Changes size and position for the widget's container.
settings.changesSizePositionColorsForTheWidgetsCo: Changes size, position, colors, and other settings for the widget's container.
settings.changesSizeFontColorForTheWidgetsText: Changes size, font, color, and other settings for the widget's text.
settings.changeTheColorFontSizeAndPositionForThis: Change the color, font size, and position for this element.
settings.startYourDayWithFreshHighResolution: Start your day with fresh, high-resolution wallpapers from Pexels.com and Unsplash.com. Explore a range of effects, filters, and adjustments to harmonize with your widget themes.
settings.makeYourWidgetsTrulyYours: Make your widgets truly yours. Choose from a variety of container styles, background hues, border colors, and more to match your unique style.
settings.breakFreeFromRestrictions: Break free from restrictions. Populate your New Tab page with as many widgets of the same type as you need, ensuring your essentials are always at your fingertips.
settings.brightenUpYourNewTab: Brighten up your New Tab with playful, animated weather icons. Rain or shine, get a quick glimpse of today's forecast and what's coming up next.
settings.experienceThePowerOfAi: Experience the power of AI right from your toolbar. Leverage the OpenAI-powered chat tool for quick answers and smart suggestions.
settings.embraceDiversityOptForADifferent: Embrace diversity. Opt for a different font style for each widget, further adding to your New Tab's visual appeal and readability.
settings.upgradeYourNewTabAesthetics: Upgrade your New Tab aesthetics with innovative Shape and Text widgets, delivering an improved and engaging visual experience.
settings.discoverAnExpandingGalaxy: Discover an expanding galaxy of premium features, continuously updated and refined to enhance your New Tab experience.
settings.showAGridToHelpWithPositioning: Show a grid to help with positioning
settings.dragToReorderWidgets: Drag to reorder widgets. Widgets higher in the list will overlay others, while lower will underlay in case of overlap.
settings.overridesContainerStyles: Overrides container background color, border, and padding
settings.lockThisPhotoToSet: Lock this photo to set it as your permanent choice, or unlock to continue with random daily photos.
settings.cautionYouAreAboutToRunOutOfStorage: Caution: You are about to run out of storage space. Adding additional content or widgets may prevent you from being able to save changes.
settings.widgetIsRunningOutOfStorageSpace: Widget is running out of storage space
settings.addingMoreContent: Adding more content to the widget could result in a failure to save changes.
settings.youHaveReachedTheMaximumNumberOfWidgets: You have reached the maximum number of widgets. The storage space allowed by the browser does not allow more.
settings.doYouHaveALayout: Do you have a layout you think others would love? Send an export of your settings and a screenshot to {'|'} and I might add it to the list. You can export your settings by going to the Settings Dashboard > Extension Settings > Advanced > Export

advanced.importOldVersionWarning: Settings are from an older version of CaretTab. We will do our best to import them, but some settings may not be compatible. Do you want to continue?
advanced.importNotCompatible: Settings are from an older version of CaretTab and are not compatible with the current version. We recommend you reset your settings and start fresh.
advanced.importSuccessful: Import successful! The page will now be reloaded. If you have any issues, please contact us at {0}
advanced.exportImportSettingsDescription: Export all CaretTab settings to a file. Clicking the button will download a file to your computer. Do not edit this file to ensure no errors when you re-import. When importing CaretTab settings, ensure you use the 'carettab-settings.json' file that was downloaded when you clicked export.
advanced.resetToDefaultDescription: This will remove all of your information and settings.
advanced.resetToDefaultDescription2: If you are signed into Premium Access, you will remain signed in.
advanced.resetBackToFreshDescription: This option essentially resets CaretTab to the state it was in when you first installed it. Use this option only as a last resort if you are experiencing issues with CaretTab.

common.slogan: Your Tab, Your Rules - Infinite customization at your fingertips!

widget.aiChatIsPoweredByChatgptFromOpenai: AI Chat is powered by ChatGPT from OpenAI
widget.toStartUsingAiChatYouNeedAnApiKeyFromOpe: To start using AI Chat, you need an API key from OpenAI.
widget.onceYouHaveYourKeyPaste: Once you have your key, paste it in the box below and you will then have access to use AI Chat.
widget.helloImAnAi: Hello! I'm an AI powered by OpenAI. How can I help?
widget.enableAToolbarForQuickAccessToUsefulTool: Enable a toolbar for quick access to useful tools.
widget.label: Label
widget.showsTheDifferenceInTime: Shows the difference in time compared to your computer's time.
widget.showsDotsToRepresentOnOffState: Shows dots to represent on/off state. Disable to use text (e.g. 1's and 0's).
widget.displaysUnusedIndicators: Displays unused indicators to create a complete grid.
widget.addTextToTheStartOrEndOfTheDate: Add text to the start or end of the date.
widget.symbolsThatAppearBetweenParts: Symbols that appear between parts of the date such as spaces and commas.
widget.makeEachDigitWithinEqual: Make each digit within the clock equal widths (e.g. "1" will be the same width as "9").
widget.theSpacingBetweenSegments: The spacing between segments such as hour, minute and delimiters.
widget.willDisplayALeadingZero: Will display a leading zero if number is less than 10.
widget.everySecondTheDelimiterWillBlink: Every second the delimiter will blink similar to a some real digital clocks.
widget.doYouWantToDisableSyncingOfYourNotes: Do you want to disable syncing of your notes? Notes will no longer update on other computers. Changing this setting could potentially result in a loss of notes, please backup your notes before proceeding. \n\nOnce syncing is disabled, you will be able to add up to 250,000 characters in your notes.
widget.areYouSureYouWantToEnableSyncing: Are you sure you want to enable syncing of notes? Your current notes will start to sync across other computers with this browser that you have logged into. \n\n**NOTE** Synced notes are limited to only 7,000 characters. If you currently have more than that, you may lose some of your notes. Please backup your notes before proceeding!
widget.allowNotesToSync: Allow notes to sync across computers. You must be signed in to the browser for syncing to work. Browsers have a higher restriction on syncing data, this means notes will be limited to only 7,000 characters. Disabling sync for notes allows up to 250,000 characters.
widget.notesAreCurrentlyLimitedTo: Notes are currently limited to {0} characters.
widget.allowsTheBrowserToRunSpellcheck: Allows the browser to run spellcheck on the notes (if available).
widget.displayTheCurrentCharacterCount: Display the current character count and the total allowed in the bottom of the notepad.
widget.theBookmarksPermissionIsNeeded: The Bookmarks permission is needed to retrieve the bookmarks you have saved in the browser. Denying this permission will prevent the Bookmarks from being shown.
widget.permissionsNeededToDisplayMostVisited: Permissions needed to display most visited
widget.theTopSitesPermissionIsNeeded: The top sites permission is needed to retrieve the list of tope sites you have visited. Denying this permission will prevent the Most Visited list from being shown.
widget.theBookmarksTypeUses: The bookmarks type uses the bookmarks saved in your browser. Permissions are needed to access your bookmarks. If you prefer to not allow this permission, try the quick links type instead.
widget.theMostVisitedTypeAccess: The most visited type access the list of top sites you have visited. Permissions are needed to access your top sites. If you prefer to not allow this permission, try the quick links type instead.
widget.maximumWidthALink: Maximum width a link can be before the text is truncated.
widget.theFaviconsPermissionIsNeeded: The Favicons permission is needed to retrieve the favicons of bookmarks. This only allows retrieving the icons websites use in the browser's address bar and does not allow any other access. Denying this permission will prevent the favicons from being shown.
widget.recommendedToNotSetTheFaviconSize: Recommended to not set the favicon size above 32. Higher sizes could result in poor image quality and larger downloads.
widget.addingMultipleQuotesWillCause: Adding multiple quotes will cause the quote to be updated each day. By default, the next quote in the list will be used. Enable "random" to pick a random quote instead.
widget.author: Author
widget.windIsCurrentlyBlowing: Wind is currently blowing at {0} from the {1} ({2}Â°).
widget.cityNamePostalCodeCoordinatesEtc: City name, postal code, coordinates, etc.
widget.ignoreMeridiemForTextAlignmentDesc: Allows you to have the time centered as if the meridiem wasn't shown. Note: may cause the meridiem to extend past the widget container.
widget.switchingTabsWarning: NOTE: Due to browser settings, this tool might pause or reset when switching tabs. Please trial run it before relying on the tool.

welcome.getAJumpStart: Get a jump-start with a basic layout or start fresh with an empty canvas?
